name: The Inner Workings of Ari's Mind
name_original: The Inner Workings of Ari's Mind
description: This game is meant to represent the craziness that is my mind! While working on this game, I had no particular ideas in mind for themes or concepts. I just ended up going with the flow, and I tend to do that with a lot of my artwork. This game is a disaster, and an assortment of things I like and bright colors. My main objective while creating this was to just make an enjoyable experience for the player, and not necessarily a challenge.
